title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Architectural Design VThe student will select one type of building complexes. Identification of design issues based on literature studies, case studies and usersâ feedback. Formulation of goal and research methodology. Selection of site and site analysis. This will be followed by design proposal in the following semester.
